citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:25pm on 3 August
2023. Arrived at facility and reached the licensee by phone after trying both phone numbers. Licensee was not available
and could not return to the facility for approximately 6 hours. Requested optimal hours from the licensee to minimize
future attempted inspections.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:25pm on 3 August 
2023. Arrived at facility and reached the licensee by phone after trying both phone numbers. Licensee was not available 
and could not return to the facility for approximately 6 hours. Requested optimal hours from the licensee to minimize 
future attempted inspections. 
 
 
End Section
